ThingDef.label: family car
ThingDef.description: Family cars are often seen grazing on the grasslands, calmly minding their own business. \n\nDue to them being completely harmless, ancient tribes tend to hunt them down for their tender... meat. They will never attack, even when threatened.

ThingDef.label: delivery truck
ThingDef.description: One of the earliest domesticated vehicles, delivery trucks are a group of simple herbivores, capable and more than happy to carry packs and burdens over long distances.

ThingDef.label: vintage car
ThingDef.description: The stylish, apex predator of the civilised world, vintage cars will stalk its prey for miles on end before launching a swift attack. Feared and revered at the same time, these beautiful cars are excellent battle animals.

ThingDef.label: pickup truck
ThingDef.description: Pickup trucks are valued companions due to their advanced intelligence. Often used as a colony help, these gentle beasts of burden are capable of hauling large objects as well as assisting in battle. Their diet is comparable to pigs; they can and will eat most anything.

race.foodType: OmnivoreAnimal, OmnivoreRoughAnimal, OvivoreAnimal, Fluid, Meal, Processed, Kibble

ThingDef.label: forklift
ThingDef.description: A peculiar vehicle, forklifts are often seen in large herds, working together to achieve their goal.\n\nThey replicate through a complicated egg laying process, where a female forklift constantly lifts and drops the egg.
